dmca.title: Notification of claimed infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: Sala Krzysztof [mailto:Krzysztof.Sala@telekomunikacja.pl] 
Sent: Monday, December 12, 2005 11:21 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Kocon Agnieszka
Subject: Notification of claimed infringement




Dear Sir 

On behalf of Members of Telekomunikacja Polska S.A. Board, I would like to
send Notification of Claimed Infingement due to illegal disclosure of data
base containing personal data of our customers in internet. I claim to
disable an access to web page  <http://www.ksiazka-telefoniczna.com>
www.ksiazka-telefoniczna.com and remove its content from your servers.


<<George Poletes.tif>> 
Yours sincerely 

Krzysztof Sala 
Director of Operations' Security Department in TP S.A. 
tel. + 48 22 622 44 78 
fax. + 48 22 696 92 85
